comments.body: Most of the exchanges are requiring verification now. This year alone, Bybit, Kucoin and OKX made KYC mandatory. The ones that I have used and that I am satisfied with. I will list them as I like them: Binance, Bybit, OKX, Huobi global and Kucoin. Withdrawal fee on Kucoin is higher on the exchangs I listed, but I do not know if it would still be like that after KYC.Read this in details. For non KYC centralized exchanges: Current list of exchanges without KYCYou can use those like Uniswap, Pancakeswap too to trade derivative. But I do not use it. Be careful of these decentralized exchanges, they can be hacked too.

comments.author: nelson4lov
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on July 14, 2023, 04:04:34 PMwhat are the best exchanges for trading derivatives? with low fee and also non KYC and KYC required. and please share crypto withdrawal fee if possible. specifically for usdt.You can check out MXC or kucoin. Last time I checked, it was possible to trade on those exchanges without KYC.  But in today's crypto market, you won't get away much from. KYC as it's enforcement is across the board so it's much harder to evade KYC. If you chose to do KYC, be sure to do so on prominent exchanges. These smaller exchanges usually get hacked or become insolvent so it's always better to keep the security of your assets on top of your priority list.
